name: Learn Animals - Kids Puzzles
description:
Learn Animals Kids Puzzles is an educational game with cute animals for all ages. Our jigsaw puzzles are suitable for children of all ages
Playing this educational baby puzzle game will help your kids to improve their recognition skills while having fun.

Everybody loves puzzles and want to play with animal toys like dinosaur, baby elephant, kangaroo, lion, cow, giraffe, zebra, panda, monkey, crocodile, penguin, squirrel, dog, cat, cammel, tortoise and more


Features of Learn Animals Kids Puzzles:
- More than 16 cute animals in this jigsaw game: baby elephant, dinosaur, monkey, kangaroo, lion, cow, cat, dog, giraffe, zebra, panda, crocodile, penguin, squirrel, cammel, tortoise and more
- jigsaw contains 4 difficulty modes
- High quality pictures with animals
- Learn to recognize animals
- This jigsaw game for children is 100% Free
- Use help if you want to see some blocks placed, simply click the plus button and it will drag n drop to interlock the correct blocks
- Undo last moves any time
- Support for smartphones, tablets and all types of screen resolutions
- Our 2 and 3 year olds have 6 blocks pieces to arrange image, 16 and 20 blocks pieces is for bigger children
- 6 block pieces for 2 and 3 year old toddlers & 16 or 20 block pieces puzzle for smart kids

This jigsaw puzzle game is a free educational game where everyone can solve puzzles wtih cute animals.
Both, boys and girls will love this animal puzzle pieces jigsaw game.

We are working on adding more pictures for your baby kids and toddlers. Kindly share your feedback on contact@skycap.co.in we would love to hear what more you need for your toddlers and babies.

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls! We create with love & care. Our free games are aimed at all-round development of your kids and toddlers, revealing their inner potential. Also helps children spend time in interesting, fascinating, fun and happy way.
